A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It's very difficult for me to choose what is the worst - E7 or E8. But it's better for Disney to make cartoons. There is no original idea in the E8 - there are only flashbacks to E4-E6 and a lot of face-palms. This film is just a poor set of parodies of excerpts of original trilogy. And at the last they have broken a good tradition of lightsaber duel :(\nI'm very sad about this film
